detailed.title: Detailed Zatoichi_1
detailed.text2: Pluto's a planet. God, Grandpa, you're such a dick. I'd like to order one large sofa chair with extra chair please. high chair, no no no recliner... and wheelchair on half. My name is Slip- Slippery Stair. I'll take ya down there for 25 shmeckels!

detailed.title: Detailed Don Kichot_1
detailed.text2: Rick, is this a Saw thing? Are you seriously Sawing the Vindicators? Listen to your sister Morty; to live is to risk it all; otherwise you're just an inert chunk of randomly assembled molecules drifting wherever the universe blows you. Oh, I'm sorry, Jerry, I didn't see you there, how much of that did you hear? God, Grandpa, you're such a dick. Haha god-damn!
